attributes.action: fit security screws to all car number plates at point of sale & MOT to prevent their theft
attributes.additional_details: Over 40,000 number plates stolen from vehicle's  each year costing over  £15 millions but to fit security screws costs 60pence per vehicle By fitting security screws to car number plates at point of sale or MOT takes a couple of minutes preventing YOU the POLICE and others wasting time effort and money SIMPLES!!! INDIA have done it already why can't we?
